tossup_question: -   –  Hybrid breakdown and lack of hybrid robustness are examples of which type of reproductive isolation?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Mechanical isolation
X) Allopatric speciation
Y) Prezygotic barriers
Z) Postzygotic barriers
bonus_question: -  11)  – 	Which of the following is not true regarding mitosis?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Sister chromatids are held together by cohesion [coh-ee-sin] complexes
X) M-Cdk drives entry of the cell into mitosis
Y) The mitotic spindle is built from actin filaments
Z) The Golgi apparatus becomes less prominent during metaphase
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Y) THE MITOTIC SPINDLE IS BUILT FROM ACTIN FILAMENTS
